languages.text: As long as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has two swords equipped, the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text: As long as the Reaper has two swords equipped, the Reaper's Weapon Skill increases by +(Reaper's Agility Bonus).
As long as the Bladedancer has two swords equipped, the Bladedancer's Weapon Skill is increased by +<u>AGI bonus</u>.
As long as the Bladedancer has two swords equipped, the Bladedancer's Weapon Skill is increased by +<u>AGI bonus</u>.
As long as the Bladedancer has two swords equipped, the Bladedancer's Weapon Skill is increased by +<u>AGI bonus</u>.

As long as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has two swords equipped, the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

languages.text: Mientras el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} tiene dos espadas equipadas, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} aumenta en +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u>.
